meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 – UAE Air Force Dial Variant
meta_description: Explore the Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 UAE Air Force dial variant, featuring a matte black dial with UAE flag colors in the 6 o’clock sub-dial, red 3H tritium markers, factory black PVD case, and powered by the Lemania 5100 movement. A rare military chronograph with distinguished heritage.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177 UAE Air Force dial, Military chronograph UAE edition, Porsche Design black dial, Lemania 5100 chronograph, UAE flag dial colors, 3H tritium military dial, factory PVD case, 1980s military chronograph

list.text: Both of the UAE dial variants came in a variety of the 7177 finishes.
Interestingly, a small batch of circa ~25 watches featuring gold-colored cases were produced.
There is a very small batch of casebacks in which the serial number's location shifted to the middle of the caseback.
This is found on UAE issued examples, in the low ~3000 serial range.

text:
The 7177 UAE variant was ordered by the UAE’s Air Force and came in
two dial variations:

list.title: Mk. 1 Dial:
list.text:
Stamped with “UAE AIR FORCE” at four o'clock and a tricolor
motif at the six o’clock subdial.

list.title: Mk. 2 Dial:
list.text:
Stamped with “UAE AIR FORCE” at four o'clock as well, but
“CENTRAL AIR BASE" stamped at the six o’clock subdial instead of a
motif.
